MyProgram 1.0 Copyright (C) 2007 Authors, Inc. This software is under the terms of the XYZ License (http://license-text.org/show.cgi?xyz). Usage: myprog --input equations-file.xml -o result-file.xml myprog -i equations-file.xml --paralell myprog -i equations-file.xml -vo result-file.xml
i, input Required. Input file with equations, xml format (see manual). o, output Output file with results, otherwise standard output. paralell Paralellize processing in multiple threads. v Show detailed processing messages. help Display this screen.
